disease: Gonococcal infection of other male genital organs

Gram stain.abnormal: Polymorphonuclear leukocytes with intracellular gram-negative diplococci (high specificity >99% and sensitivity >95% in symptomatic men; less sensitive in asymptomatic men)

risk_factors: Sex with a partner with concurrent partners

required: Gram stain showing polymorphonuclear leukocytes with intracellular gram-negative diplococci (in symptomatic men)
